owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

CHALLENGE_PERIOD().notice: Withdrawal challenge period (7 days for mainnet, 1 hour for testnet)

MAX_PROOF_AGE().notice: Maximum age for withdrawal proofs (30 days)

challengeWithdrawal(bytes32,string).notice: Challenge a withdrawal during challenge period

executeWithdrawal(bytes32).notice: Execute a withdrawal after challenge period

initiateWithdrawal((address,uint256,byte.notice: Initiate a withdrawal from Arbitrum to Ethereum

isWithdrawalReady(bytes32).notice: Check if withdrawal is ready for execution

userWithdrawals(address,uint256).notice: Mapping of user addresses to their withdrawal history

withdrawals(bytes32).notice: Mapping of withdrawal IDs to withdrawal data
